page.title: 03LEGENDS
page.content: Bushtown is another place of interest There is a Legend as to how it got its name.The legend says that whilst the building of a Church was taking place a savage bull kept appearing and wrecking that which had been built. This went on for a long time until the priest went to the site to guard it.When the bull appeared the priest got a stick and beat the bull He then stuck the stick in the ground and dared the bull to pass.The bull left and never returned.The stick that the priest stuck in the ground took root and grew into a bush.This bush can be seen to this day. The town is about a mile and a quarter outside the village of Hilltown near to the Kilkeel,Bryansford roads.
